title: Pakistan stands with Afghanistan in its fight against terrorism: FO Spox
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 10 (APP): Pakistan on Monday strongly condemned the bomb blasts in Afghanistan’s Zabul and Parwan provinces leading to loss of lives and expressed solidarity with the country’s fight against terrorism.
“We stand by the government and people of Afghanistan in their fight against the scourge of terrorism,” Foreign Office Spokesperson Zahid Hafeez Chaudhri said in a tweet.
Pakistan strongly condemns the blasts in #Zabul and #Parwan, Afghanistan, that led to loss of precious lives & injuries. Our thoughts & prayers are with the victims & their families. We stand by the Govt. & people of Afghanistan in their fight against the scourge of terrorism.
— Zahid Hafeez Chaudhri (@Zhchaudhri) May 10, 2021
The FO Spokesperson said, “Our thoughts & prayers are with the victims and their families.”
The separate roadside bomb blasts in Afghanistan’s two provinces resulted in killing of 13 and wounding of at least 37 civilians.
